title: Andha Arabic Kadaloram Lyrics Bombay
stanzas: <div>Andha Arabic Kadaloram Lyrics Bombay

Andha arabic kadaloram
or azhagai kandeney
andha kanni thendral
aadai velukka kangal kandeney

hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa
hey hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa

ye palli thamaraiye
un paadham kandeney
un pattu thaavani sariya
sariya meedham kandeney

hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa
hey hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa

Saelai oram vandhu
aalai modhiyathu
aahaa enna sugamo.

pinju pon viralgal
nenjai theendiyadhu
aahaa enna idhamo..

siththam kilukilukka
raththam thudi thudikka
muththam nooru vidhamo

achcham naanam madam
aadai kalindhavudan
ayyoo dheiva padhamo.

hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa
hey hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa

Andha arabic kadaloram
or azhagai kandeney
andha kanni thendral
aadai velukka kangal kandeney

hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa
hey hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa

ye palli thamaraiye
un paadham kandeney
un pattu thaavani sariya
sariya meedham kandeney
hammaa
hey hey hammaa

Solli kodutha pinnum
alli kodutha pinnum
muththam meedham irukku

dheepam maraindha pinnum
boomi irunda pinnum
kannil velicham irukku

vaanam pozhindha pinnum
boomi nanaindha pinnum
saaral sarasam irukku

kaamam kalantha pinnum
kangal kalandha pinnum
kadhal maraindhu kidakku

hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa
hey hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa

Andha arabic kadaloram
or azhagai kandeney
andha kanni thendral
aadai velukka kangal kandeney

hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa
hey hammaa hammaa
hamma hamma hammaa
